mapper.select: SELECT a.member_id , a.member_pw , a.member_nm , a.member_nicknm , a.member_fl_cd , a.member_st_cd , (select scodes.scode_nm from scodes where lcode = 'MR' and scode = member_fl_cd ) as member_fl_nm , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BOOK_CART C WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) as cartCnt , a.member_sub_yn , a.manager_cnfm_yn , a.mcnfm_id , a.member_profile_path , a.member_profile_nm , a.member_mile , c.subsp_edt , b.mcnfm_cntr_edt FROM member a , manager_confirm b , subscription c WHERE a.member_id = b.member_id (+) and a.member_id = c.member_id (+) and a.member_id = #{memberId} and a.member_pw = #{memberPw}
